concept.title: Application server caching behavior
concept.shortdesc: caches user information and credentials in a security cache and the application login module is not launched while a user entry is valid in this cache.

conbody.p: caches user information and credentials in a security cache and the application login module is not launched while a user entry is valid in this cache. The default invalidation time for this security cache is ten minutes, where the user is inactive for ten minutes. For more information, see WebSphere caching behavior.
